channel.description: For this milestone, you will be creating a new project to run a Point-of-Sale system (POS). A POS is the modern equivalent of a cash register, used to put together a sale, take payment, print receipts, and typically integrates with a businessesâ€™ inventory tracking system and accounting system. In our case, we are focusing on the kind of POS found in the fast-food industry; one that takes orders, and sends an order to the kitchen, as well as taking payment and printing a receipt.
